name: Arun Vignesh Malarkkan

publications.title: Multi-view Causal Graph Fusion Based Anomaly Detection in Cyber-Physical Infrastructures
publications.authors: AV Malarkkan, D Wang, Y Fu
publications.venue: Proceedings of the 33rd ACM International Conference on Information and Knowledge Management
publications.abstract: This paper presents a multi-view causal graph fusion framework for robust anomaly detection in cyber-physical infrastructures. Achieved 9% improvement in ROC score.

publications.title: Causal Graph Profiling via Structural Divergence for Robust Anomaly Detection in Cyber-Physical Systems
publications.authors: AV Malarkkan, H Bai, D Wang, Y Fu
publications.abstract: Develops a cyber-attack detection framework incorporating causal graph learning and structural analysis. Shows 12% improvement over baseline models.
publications.venue_full: Under Review - ACM Transactions on Knowledge Discovery from Data (TKDD)

publications.title: Incremental Causal Graph Learning for Online Cyberattack Detection in Cyber-Physical Infrastructures
publications.authors: AV Malarkkan, D Wang, H Bai, Y Fu
publications.abstract: Developed a continual causal graph learning framework with spectral properties for temporal streaming data in critical infrastructures.
publications.venue_full: Under Review - IEEE Transactions on Big Data (TBD)

publications.title: Rethinking spatio-temporal anomaly detection: A vision for causality-driven cybersecurity
publications.authors: AV Malarkkan, H Bai, X Wang, A Kaushik, D Wang, Y Fu
publications.abstract: Vision paper proposing causality-driven approaches for spatio-temporal anomaly detection in cybersecurity applications.

publications.title: A survey on data-centric ai: Tabular learning from reinforcement learning and generative ai perspective
publications.authors: W Ying, C Wei, N Gong, X Wang, H Bai, AV Malarkkan, S Dong, D Wang, D Zhang, Y Fu
publications.abstract: Comprehensive survey on data-centric AI approaches focusing on tabular learning from RL and generative AI perspectives.

publications.title: CAFE: Causally-Guided Automated Feature Engineering with Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning
publications.abstract: Multi-agent reinforcement learning framework guided by causal graph discovery for automated feature generation with causally-aligned reward shaping.
publications.venue_full: Under Review - AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence 2025

publications.title: DELTA: Privacy-Preserving Generative Data Reprogramming
publications.abstract: Two-phase framework combining reinforcement learning and variational generative modeling for feature transformation with 9% performance gain and 35% privacy leakage reduction.
publications.venue_full: Under Review - IEEE International Conference on Data Mining 2025
